duration_raw: until the next time you make your daily preparations
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Endure Elements](/Spells.aspx?ID=99)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 335 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 10 minutes ([somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations
</row>

</column>

---

You shield the target against dangerous temperatures. Choose severe cold or heat. The target is protected from the temperature you chose (but not extreme cold or heat).

---
**Heightened (3rd)** The target is protected from severe cold and heat.

**Heightened (5th)** The target is protected from severe cold, severe heat, extreme cold, and extreme heat.
name: Endure Elements

summary: Protect a creature from severe cold or heat.
